attr.title: Lost Potato
attr.desc: Lost Potato is a minimalistic top-down roguelite where you can't damage enemies directly. Push them into spikes, reflect bullets and help a young potato find its way out of a jungle filled with man-eating tribes!
attr.inst: Purchase the game either from itch OR steam. Download the game and copy over all the game data to ports/lostpotato/assets
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game either from [itch](https://blobfishdev.itch.io/lost-potato) OR [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1365010/Lost_Potato/). Download the game and copy over all the game data to ports/lostpotato/assets
